titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 65) to amend title 10, United States Code, to permit retired members of the Armed Forces who have a service-connected disability to receive military retired pay concurrently with veterans' disability compensation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Bilirakis. Petition No: 103-15.

bill.summary: 3/9/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 65 (permitting military retirees who have a service-connected disability to receive military retired pay concurrently with veterans' disability compensation).
